subject: Economy
question_en: What is the primary sector in agriculture?
question_hi: आर्थिक विभागों में प्रवर्धन क्या है?
explanation_en:
The primary sector in agriculture refers to farming, which involves cultivating crops and raising livestock.
आर्थिक विभागों में प्रवर्धन के लिए प्रश्न - आर्थिक विभागों में प्रवर्धन के लिए प्रश्न - राजनेता प्रश्न - आर्थिक विभागों में प्रवर्धन
A_hi: समाजवादी के लिए प्रश्न - आर्थिक विभागों में प्रवर्धन
explanation_en: In the economic sectors, the process of production involves converting resources into goods and services.
In the economic sectors, production is the process of converting resources into goods and services.
question_en: What is the process of converting raw materials into finished products called?
explanation_en: The process of manufacturing involves converting raw materials into finished products through various stages of production.

question_en: What is the primary role of agriculture in economy?
explanation_en: Agriculture plays a crucial role in providing food and raw materials for industries.
